deal_id: Auckland to Fiji and return - NEW CRUISING FROM NZ
title: Auckland to Fiji and return - NEW CRUISING FROM NZ
inclusions_evidence: AUD$400* Onboard Spending Money per stateroom, to go towards your drinks, shore excursions, spa treatments and onboard purchases.

reasoning: The deal includes a cruise with several inclusions, making it a good value for a cruise experience, but lacks flight costs which are essential for a complete travel package.
